title: Why is gunblade so popular on kat on op.gg??

replies.body:
because not only does kat have hybrid scalings but its active provides a supplement to her burst pattern.
it's literally a point and click AP scaling instant nuke for like 1/3rd of a  squishies HP bar.
Because it's the perfect item for her? lol
She auto attacks a lot in her combos early game so revolver is good for that and it adds a ton of damage to her combos once she completes Gunblade.  Dual scaling + sustain is also a nice perk

kat has hybrid scalings, the active provides a little bit of extra damage to her burst, and it grants omnivamp.

gunblade is basically the bloodthirster for ghybrid scaling champions. she regains a lot of health through it.
It's her best first item bar none

She has decent Ad hybrid scaling.
Helps with her burst as an assassin.
Helps give a little healing as she one shots someone.

and... well that's about it.
